text: Ashton Community Science College is a coeducational secondary school located in Ashton-on-Ribble in the English county of Lancashire. It is a community school administered by Lancashire County Council. The school also has a specialism in science. Ashton Community Science College offers GCSEs, BTECs and OCR Nationals as programmes of study for students. ==References== ==External links== *Ashton Community Science College official website Category:Secondary schools in Lancashire Category:Community schools in Lancashire Category:Buildings and structures in Preston Category:Schools in Preston Category:Preston, Lancashire
title: Ashton Community Science College
